name: Help, I cast the wrong spell!
name_original: Help, I cast the wrong spell!
description:
Recommended to use downloaded version for optimal performance

Oh shoot, you cast the wrong spell, and now it's raining dynamite! Escape the trail of explosions, and maybe use the destructive power for good. 

It's a fast paced, quick-retry precision platformer.

Standard platformer controls, with support for gamepad.
R or menu button to restart
T to toggle speedrun timer (developer best time is 4:24.60)
Ctrl+Shift+S to skip a level if you're stuck

A game made by JUSTCAMH in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 49

With music by ClockMaker (listen to the soundtrack)

And a bit of audio help from Dim
